org.fax4j.spi.http
Interface HTTPClient

All Superinterfaces:
ProviderImplementation
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractHTTPClient, ApacheHTTPClient
public interface HTTPClient
extends ProviderImplementation

This interface defines the HTTP client used to submit HTTP requests.

Since:
0.1
Version:
1.03
Author:
Sagie Gur-Ari

          This enum holds the supported HTTP methods.

submitHTTPRequest

HTTPResponse submitHTTPRequest(HTTPRequest httpRequest,
                               HTTPClientConfiguration httpClientConfiguration,
                               HTTPClient.HTTPMethod httpMethod)
Submits the HTTP request and returns the HTTP response.

Parameters:
httpRequest - The HTTP request to send
httpClientConfiguration - HTTP client configuration
